TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HostSecurityManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 允許控制及自訂應用程式定義域的安全性行為。

span.span: Allows the control and customization of security behavior for application domains.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立新，通用語言執行階段查詢是否存在，其參與安全性決策。When you create a new , the common language runtime queries the for the presence of a , which participates in making security decisions for the . 主機提供者應實作繼承自主機安全性管理員類別。Host providers should implement a host security manager that inherits from the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範的簡單實作。The following example shows a very simple implementation of a . [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#1)]

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

para.span: 某些成員組件已載入，以隱含或明確時被呼叫。

span.span: Some members of a are called whenever an assembly is loaded, either implicitly or explicitly.

para.span: 和方法必須載入任何組件，因為這樣會導致成員進行遞迴呼叫。

span.span: The and methods must not load any assemblies, because doing so will result in the members of the being recursively called.

para.span: 若要避免循環參考，您應該建立可能會導致要載入組件，以隱含或明確，衍生自類別的建構函式中的類別的新執行個體。

span.span: To avoid circular references, you should create new instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either implicitly or explicitly, in the constructor of a class that derives from .

for full trust for inheritors.

span.span: Create instances of classes that can cause assemblies to be loaded, either explicitly or implicitly, in this constructor.

para.span: Get 存取子的屬性和和每當組件已載入，而且其後續載入的組件會造成循環參考時，會呼叫方法。

span.span: The get accessor for the property and the and methods are called whenever an assembly is loaded, and their subsequent loading of assemblies will cause circular references.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust (System.Security.Policy.Evidence applicationEvidence, System.Security.Policy.Evidence activatorEvidence, System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust DetermineApplicationTrust(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence applicationEvidence, class System.Security.Policy.Evidence activatorEvidence, class System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function DetermineApplicationTrust (applicationEvidence As Evidence, activatorEvidence As Evidence, context As TrustManagerContext) As ApplicationTrust

public: virtual System::Security::Policy::ApplicationTrust ^ DetermineApplicationTrust(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ applicationEvidence, System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ activatorEvidence, System::Security::Policy::TrustManagerContext ^ context);

param.name: applicationEvidence
param.span: 要啟動之應用程式的辨識項。

span.span: The evidence for the application to be activated.

param.name: activatorEvidence
param.span: 或者，啟動中應用程式定義域的辨識項。

span.span: Optionally, the evidence for the activating application domain.
The trust context.

summary.span: 決定是否應該執行應用程式。

span.span: Determines whether an application should be executed.

returns.span: 包含應用程式相關信任資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that contains trust information about the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作會呼叫應用程式安全性管理員，以便判斷是否應該執行的應用程式。The base implementation calls the application security manager to determine if the application should be executed. 基底實作不會使用啟動項辨識項。The base implementation does not use the activator evidence. 不過，覆寫的實作無法使用啟動項辨識項來決定嘗試啟動應用程式的應用程式定義域的安全性辨識項。However, an overridden implementation could use the activator evidence to determine the security evidence for the application domain attempting to activate the application. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#3)]

exception.span: 在應用程式辨識項中找不到 物件。

span.span: An object could not be found in the application evidence.
-or-

exception.span: 啟動引數的 屬性是 。

span.span: The property in the activation arguments is .

exception.span: 授權集不包含 所指定的最小要求集。

span.span: The grant set does not contain the minimum request set specified by the .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel DomainPolicy
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DomainPolicy As PolicyLevel
public: virtual property System::Security::Policy::PolicyLevel ^ DomainPolicy { System::Security::Policy::PolicyLevel ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得目前應用程式定義域的安全性原則。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the security policy for the current application domain.

value.span: 目前應用程式定義域的安全性原則。

span.span: The security policy for the current application domain.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 這個基底實作一定會傳回 `null`。The base implementation always returns `null`. 這個屬性會在呼叫建立時間。This property is called at creation time. 它可讓主機提供的原則，目前。It allows a host to supply a policy for the current . 原則層級是由下列項目所組成：A policy level consists of the following: - 一組程式碼群組會組織成單一的根樹狀結構。A set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree. - 一組具名使用權限集合所參考的指定權限授與程式碼群組所屬的程式碼的程式碼群組。A set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group. - 完全信任組件清單。A list of fully trusted assemblies. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請參閱的繼承者注意事項重要實作資訊的類別。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

exception.span: 此方法使用在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 中已過時的程式碼存取安全性 (CAS) 原則。

span.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

exception.span: 若要啟用 CAS 原則對舊版 .NET Framework 的相容性，請使用 [<legacyCasPolicy> 項目](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

summary.span: 取得旗標，表示主機的重要安全性原則元件。

span.span: Gets the flag representing the security policy components of concern to the host.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指定安全性原則元件。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies security policy components.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This property can be overridden in a derived class. 這個基底實作一定會傳回 。The base implementation always returns . 在衍生的主應用程式可以變更的值，這個屬性的子集時感興趣。The derived host can change the value of this property when only a subset of the is of interest. 可能的子集包括 none、 拒絕的集合，原則層級和組件辨識項。The possible subsets include none, the refused set, the policy level, and assembly evidence. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的屬性。The following example shows how to override the property for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence (Type evidenceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAppDomainEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GenerateAppDomainEvidence (evidenceType As Type) As EvidenceBase
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAppDomainEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType);

span.span: The evidence type.

summary.span: 針對應用程式定義域要求特定辨識項型別。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the application domain.

returns.span: 要求的應用程式定義域辨識項。

span.span: The requested application domain evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作會傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. Common language runtime 時呼叫這個方法需要指定類型的辨識項目前。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current . 傳回的值做為主機提供的辨識項，而且會儲存在集合屬性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the collection of the property. 您可以使用方法，以從集合中取得所產生的辨識項。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the collection. 若要取得這個方法的回呼，主機必須指定加上旗標屬性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 產生的辨識項的這個方法可讓主機的辨識項產生延遲之前需要辨識項。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 版和更早版本中，是為了提供在載入時間，藉由覆寫的辨識項方法。In the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我們建議您改用提供辨識項，而不是覆寫。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法會回撥到只會針對類型的主機具有指定的覆寫中的辨識項方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 傳回值為`null`指出主機無法產生此特定類型的辨識項。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫自訂主機安全性管理員的方法。The following example shows how to override the method for a custom host security manager. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/CS/customsecuritymanager.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Security.HostSecurityManager#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.HostSecurityManager/VB/customsecuritymanager.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence (Type evidenceType, System.Reflection.Assembly assembly);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.EvidenceBase GenerateAssemblyEvidence(class System.Type evidenceType, class System.Reflection.Assembly assembly) cil managed
public: virtual System::Security::Policy::EvidenceBase ^ GenerateAssemblyEvidence(Type ^ evidenceType, System::Reflection::Assembly ^ assembly);

span.span: The evidence type.
The target assembly.

summary.span: 針對組件要求特定辨識項型別。

span.span: Requests a specific evidence type for the assembly.
The requested assembly evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作會傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 指定類型的辨識項需要目前組件時，common language runtime 會呼叫這個方法。The common language runtime calls this method when evidence of the specified type is needed for the current assembly. 傳回的值做為主機提供的辨識項，而且會儲存在屬性。The returned value is used as host-supplied evidence, and is stored in the property. 您可以使用方法，以取得產生的辨識項的屬性。You can use the method to obtain the generated evidence from the property. 若要取得這個方法的回呼，主機必須指定加上旗標屬性。To get a callback to this method, hosts must specify the flag in the property. 產生的辨識項的這個方法可讓主機的辨識項產生延遲之前需要辨識項。This method of generating evidence allows hosts to delay evidence generation for an until the evidence is needed. 在.NET Framework 3.5 和舊版中，是為了提供在載入時間，藉由覆寫的辨識項方法。In the .NET Framework 3.5 and earlier versions, it was necessary to provide evidence at load time by overriding the method. 我們建議您改用提供辨識項，而不是覆寫。We recommend that you use to provide evidence instead of overriding . 方法會回撥到只會針對類型的主機具有指定的覆寫中的辨識項方法。The method is called back into only for types of evidence that the host has specified in the override of the method. 傳回值為`null`指出主機無法產生此特定類型的辨識項。A return value of `null` indicates that the host cannot generate evidence of this specific type.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Type[] GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type[] GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes () As Type()
public: virtual cli::array <Type ^> ^ GetHostSuppliedAppDomainEvidenceTypes();

summary.span: 判斷主機可為應用程式定義域提供的辨識項型別 (如有要求的話)。

span.span: Determines which evidence types the host can supply for the application domain, if requested.
An array of evidence types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作會傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 這個方法所傳回的型別決定是否到回呼叫方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 這份清單中的類型存在並不表示主機必須要能夠產生此辨識項型別，但它可能是能夠。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 基於這個原因，所以最好先過度指定，而不是在-指定這個清單中的類型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別可以覆寫這個方法。This method can be overridden by a derived class. 基底實作會傳回`null`。The base implementation returns `null`. 這個方法所傳回的型別決定是否到回呼叫方法。The types returned by this method determine whether the method is called back into. 這份清單中的類型存在並不表示主機必須要能夠產生此辨識項型別，但它可能是能夠。The presence of a type in this list does not mean that the host must be able to generate this evidence type, but that it may be able to. 基於這個原因，所以最好先過度指定，而不是在-指定這個清單中的類型。For that reason, it is best to over-specify rather than under-specify the types in this list.

summary.span: 提供要載入之組件的應用程式定義域辨識項。

The evidence to be used for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以在衍生類別中被覆寫。This method can be overridden in a derived class. 這個方法會呼叫每當建立物件。This method is called whenever an object is created. `inputEvidence`參數是從通用語言執行平台計算的辨識項。The `inputEvidence` parameter is the computed evidence from the common language runtime. 主應用程式實作可以選擇擴充或縮減辨識項。The host implementation can choose to extend or reduce the evidence. 傳回值是要用於應用程式定義域的辨識項。The return value is the evidence to be used for the application domain. 基底實作一律會傳回做為傳遞的辨識項物件`inputEvidence`參數。The base implementation always returns the evidence object passed in as the `inputEvidence` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 請參閱的繼承者注意事項重要實作資訊的類別。See the Notes to Inheritors for the class for critical implementation information.

param.name: evidence
param.span: 用來評估原則的辨識項集合。

span.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: 根據指定的辨識項，判斷授與程式碼的權限。

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: 可由安全性系統授與的使用權限集合。

span.span: The permission set that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會叫用的安全性原則引擎，提供指定的辨識項。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with the specified evidence. 安全性原則會決定結果。The result is determined by the security policy.

span.span: is .
